page.title: 13THE POST OFFICE AND SHOP.
page.content: Many years ago,Spreyton used to have several shops,but now we have just one shop and we are very lucky because not many small villages are able to have shops these days. The shop used to be a cobbler's,where people could buy shoes and take old ones to be mended.The Post Office used to be opposite but it is now someone's home.There also used to be a bakery,a cycle repair shop,a butchers,smithy and a cider factory.Jean and David Underhill,who run the shop have been the shopkeepers for three years and live in a house joined to it.Jean runs the shop because she enjoys the children coming in to see her. In the shop she sells greengrocery,groceries,sweets,crisps,d rinks,some toys and also newspapers to people who order them.
